metadata.title: Auxiliary Weapons Pack
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex additional credit: R4V3-0N, Alder
metadata.description:
This mod adds several support weapons and drones which have beneficial effects aside from damaging the enemy ship. To use this mod, you must have Hyperspace 1.3+ and Vertex Tags and Utility Functions. It must be patched after Vertex, so the load order should look something like this:
| ... | Vertex Tags and Utility Functions | Auxiliary Weapons Pack V ...
